summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of TTS streaming app (Jailex HUD) with new Twitch chat integration and Chat Overlay features

design_issues.issue: CORS errors in console when connecting to Kick API
design_issues.description: Expected browser behavior blocking cross-origin requests to external APIs

design_issues.issue: React hydration warning about span/select nesting
design_issues.description: HTML validation warning in voice selection dropdown

passed_tests: App loads successfully with version 1.4.0 (Chat Overlay) showing new features
All 7 tabs present and clickable: Playback, Voices, Chat, Keywords, Timers, Overlay, Connections
New Overlay tab displays Chat Overlay panel correctly
Overlay URL input shows proper format with channel and token parameters
Copy overlay URL button is present and clickable
Preview overlay button opens new window successfully
Chat overlay route (/overlay) loads with transparent background perfect for OBS
Overlay accepts URL parameters correctly (font size, background opacity via CSS variables)
Twitch connection section shows all required fields
Twitch channel name input accepts and updates values
Twitch OAuth token input accepts password-masked tokens
Twitch enable checkbox toggles correctly and updates status pill
Twitch status pill shows connection states (Disconnected/Connected)
Keywords can be added and removed successfully
All tab navigation works with proper active state indicators
Chat overlay CSS variables set correctly from URL parameters
OBS setup instructions and URL parameters documentation present in overlay tab
